properties.Observation: Located in the Hanthana reserve. Water from water springs and a canal leading from the water springs is collected in a catchpit and distributed trough a stock tank. The catchpit has no cover and the boundaries are not marked.
properties.Description: Construction of Concrete water storage tank of 20 cum - size internal t 3mx3mx2.5/Establishing of a filtering system/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: The water source is wariyagala Ela. A 1.2m x 1.2m x 0.9m Size catchpit constructed and the water is taken to the stock tank and distributed. A stock tank (2.5m x 2.5m x 1.8m) has been constructed. A 8purch plot of land has been allocated for the filter system. (Stock tank Location - N 7.204563 / E 80.633077)
properties.Description: Establishing of a filtering system/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Repairing the existing pipe lines/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: A dam (L=6m, H=0.6m) is built across the Haloya canal and the water collected in it is sent to a stock tanks(L=0.4m, W=2.4m, H=1.8m), where the water distributed. There are filtration system and no boundaries.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open-type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 10, welded on 40mm x 40mm x 5mm angle frame complete with application of two coats enamel paint over two coats of anticorrosive paint and complete.All as per detail drawing No.CPC/CS/11/04/2017/TYPE-ST/07/Establishing of a filtering system/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water is drown from the watagoda main canal and distributed through a stock tank (Stock tank N-7.211897, E-80.622333). There are filtration system and no boundaries.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Establishing of a filtering system/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Located on Wariyagala GND. Water is drown from the Wariyagala canal and distributed.  There are no boundaries. The plumbing system is dilapidated. (Stock tanks and filtration system Location- N-7.205521, E-80.637339)
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Construction of a maintenance room/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water is drown from the Nillamba tank pita ela canal and distributed.  There are no boundaries.  (Stock tanks and filtration system Location- N-7.198579, E-80.644651). The water filtration system is not working properly.
properties.Description: Construction of new catchpit (1.2m x 1.2m x 0.9m)/Earth excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus materials up to 30m by Manually./Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing for structure -05 uses/1:3:6 (40mm) concrete manual mix (volume batching)/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Tidying up/Contingancies 10%
